local_intent: Detect the maroon_square, open the gripper, move to a safe height above it, and align with tight tolerance to complete the approach phase.
coherence_with_global: Implements the global approach segment: detection with retry, open gripper, MoveAbove (offset_z=0.05, 1500 ms), then ApproachAndAlign (tolerance=0.005, 2000 ms), stopping before grasp.
